entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 18. POP 30%
